str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To give order, command, charge. From epi and tasso; to arrange upon, i.e. Order.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) of time: still, yet, even now, (b) of degree: even, further, more, in addition. Perhaps akin to etos; 'yet, ' still.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.
